abstract: Former Detroit-area Police Officer William Melendez is found guilty of assault and misconduct in beating of black driver Floyd Dent during traffic stop in Inkster that was caught on video; Melendez is white.
lead_paragraph: A former Detroit-area police officer who is white was found guilty of assault and misconduct in the beating of a black driver during a traffic stop that was captured on video.

headline.main: Michigan: Ex-Officer Guilty in Beating of Floyd Dent

snippet: A former Detroit-area police officer who is white was found guilty of assault and misconduct in the beating of a black driver during a traffic stop that was captured on video.
